entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
